sentences.en: We must take preventive measures to reduce crime in the area.
sentences.cn: 我们必须采取预防措施来减少这个地区的犯罪。

sentences.en: The police were able to take preventive action and avoid a possible riot.
sentences.cn: 警方及时采取防范措施，避免了可能发生的骚乱。

sentences.en: Too much is spent on curative medicine and too little on preventive medicine.
sentences.cn: 在治疗医学上花费太多，而在预防医学上花费太少。
